name: FrostBite (itch) (Avineesh "Avi" Kompella)
description:
Game project developed for ICS 161 at UC Irvine during the Winter 2018 quarter.  

FrostBite is a single-player automatic runner. You play as a snowman trapped in the desert with a limited amount of chill (health), who must reach his son before he melts and dies. The snowman loses chill:

    • Over time from the heat of the sun. 
    • If the snowman hits/touches one of the many hot items in the desert. 
    • If he throws snowballs that come from his body. 

On the other hand, if the snowman collects one of the cold items in the desert, he regains chill. Reach your son to escape the desert before you run out of chill!

TEAM MEMBERS:

Christian L. Bond Flasza
